publishedfiledetails.title: eco's Garden Decor
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1][b]MOD ID: 880871931[/b][/h1]

[b]Craft fountains, topiary, indoor/outdoor lighting, fences, and planters for your garden![/b]

[h1][b]100% Stackable mod.[/b][/h1] 

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/d1hqw25zt/gardenbutton1.png][/img]

[h1]All items can be picked up. (Hold use key to pick up.)
If item is destroyed, after planting, it will return the exact amount of materials used to create it.
Engram cost: 0
Level needed to learn engram: 1
Items can be planted on the ground, in the water, on catwalks, foundations/ceilings, and rafts/platform saddles.
All items have HP[/h1]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880871931/133259227522031122/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/ak5zotgyh/gardenadmin.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/670764308/217691032441409625/][img]https://s17.postimg.cc/7a392oz2n/gardenmodinfo.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880871931/133259227522038091/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/pof4q0ri1/Bug_Reports.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880871931/1318836262672784124/][img]https://s9.postimg.cc/fd528jszz/FAQs.png[/img][/url]

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/nbk5vc661/gardenbutton2.png][/img]

[h1][b]Mod includes:[/b][/h1]

[b]Crafting Table with the following:[/b]

Gnome Skin (Can be worn over a Helmet)
Gnome Door (Snaps to Gnome Home)
Gnome Home (Can change the color of the house via the radial wheel. Can be painted)
2 Bonsai Trees
Hedge (Snaps to foundations)
6 Fences (Snaps to foundations)
6 Fence Gate Frames (Snaps to foundations)
6 Gates (Snaps to Fence Gate Frames)
3 Wall Fountains
2 Round Fountains
12 Planters
2 Wall Flower Boxes
17 Topiary Dinosaurs
6 Hanging Lights
19 Ground Lights
2 Wall Lanterns
Lamp Post
Pergola
Small Bush
Wall Ivy (snaps on a wall)
Ivy Ceiling
Sloped Ivy Ceiling
Scarecrow
Stone Snail Garden Statue
10 Stained Glass Building Pieces (Works like greenhouse glass and can be painted)

[b]NEW![/b]

Decorative Grass Floors
Decorative Floors (with switchable textures - Hold "e" to change)
Decorative Water Floors
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880871931/1482109512313153709/]Things to know about the new Decorative Floors![/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880871931/1482109512313153709/][img]https://s8.postimg.cc/4z32qi5yd/Decorative_Water_Floors.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://www.patreon.com/ecoModsGames][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/5ibmqtqm1/patreon.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://discord.gg/8C3GUFt][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/c5men4b6x/Discord.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco][img]https://s22.postimg.cc/ehjqv7s7l/logicservers-banner.png[/img][/url]

Server Hosting Provided by [url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco]LogicServers[/url]
[b]Use promo code eco for 20% off[/b]
I receive NO payment from this company I just really like them :)


[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/4knai8crd/gardeninstall.png][/img]

[h1][b]Having issues installing or updating a mod?[/b][/h1]
[url=https://www.bluefangsolutions.com/adding-mods-to-your-ark-game-server/]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Text instructions
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6MmSoZdRA8]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Video instructions

[h1][b]MOD ID: 880871931[/b][/h1]

[h1][b]Missing items?[/b][/h1]
If you updated the mod and are missing items then your install is probably corrupt. You must follow the instructions [b][u]specifically[/u][/b] for your server host.

[h1][b]Can't place items or find the Landscape Crafting Table engram?[/b][/h1]
If you can't place an item from this mod then your server probably hasn't updated with the latest version. If you can't find the engram make sure the mod is copied over to the server completely and the mod ID is listed under active mods. 

[img=https://s18.postimg.cc/o5jzxzn3d/gardencheck.png][/img]
